elements msglevel msglevel Element
msglevel &msglevel.purpose;
&msglevel.synopsis.gen; Description
MsgLevel is part of the additional information associated with a message in a MsgSet. It identifies the relative importance or severity of a message.
Processing expectations
&format.context; &format.csuppress;
On the whole, the semantics of MsgSet are not clearly defined.
&msglevel.parents.gen; &msglevel.children.gen;
Examples
For examples, see &msglevel.example.seealso.gen;.
